item.title: Using Plantuml from Vim
item.description: Creating diagrams is a great way to communicate with others. Writing in vim is a great way to communicate with yourself. Combine them and it’s just great! The resulting workflow: Just open a plantuml file and use :PlantumlOpen to launch a live reloading browser with the preview. Pre-requisite software: plantuml Required plugins: Plug 'aklt/plantuml-syntax' " syntax hl for pumlPlug 'tyru/open-browser.vim' " hooks for opeing browserPlug 'weirongxu/plantuml-previewer.vim' " previewerIf you (like me) just love some ascii art, use the entr or similar here:
